headline: Try some Karmuh fun for remote team building
description:
One of my favorite team-building tools with my remote team back in the day was karma on HipChat. We would use it to reward team members with the most karma at the end of the week. I built this Slack app to help teammates recognize each other’s accomplishments. If anyone is interested in trying it out, use your Slack email to send me a message at hello@karmuh.app once you’ve signed up to get an extended trial. Hope you like it!
https://karmuh.app
headline_zh-Hans: 在远程团队建设中尝试一些Karmuh的乐趣
headline_zh-Hant: 在遠程團隊建設中嘗試一些Karmuh的樂趣
description_zh-Hans:
当年我最喜欢的远程团队建设工具之一就是HipChat上的karma。我们会在周末用它来奖励拥有最多 "业力 "的团队成员。我建立了这个Slack应用程序，以帮助队友们互相认可对方的成就。如果有人有兴趣试用，请在注册后用你的Slack邮箱给我发信息：hello@karmuh.app，以获得延长试用期。希望你喜欢它!
https://karmuh.app
